name: Arizona Sunshine II
summary: Dust off your shotgun and sharpen your machete. Accompanied by an all-new friend, Arizona Sunshine 2 takes you back to the limb-strewn deserts of post-apocalyptic Arizona in this gory, next-gen sequel to one of VR's most-played games.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Arizona Sunshine 2 - Reveal Trailer | PS VR2 Games
